caption:
UPDATE : congrats to @blowoutsbyabbeandmore @handpaintedbysammi !!

#AQUAGE X ECOHEADS collab and giveaway!!! 

✨We are on a mission to make conscious living the new simple choice. Kicking off the mission with a FREE shower head and Aquage all star lineup (1) each of our top 10 Best sellers! ✨

ENTRY details below 👇🏼 

1. like this post
2. tag 3 friends 

We will choose ✨2 winners ✨
BONUS: the more you tag, the better chance you have to win!!

Read below👇🏼 to find out how @ecoheadsnorthamerica @sustainbeautyco & @aquagehaircare  are making big waves to a more #sustainable future !! 

Aquage haircare products are more than beauty solutions. They’re a choice for conscious living; they embody the commitment to protecting our ecosystem. Our legacy revolves around
delivering luxurious formulas, and now, in alignment with our commitment we've partnered with Plastic Bank, embracing environmentally responsible practices.
•ocean-sourced packaging = repurposed ocean and coastal plastics crafted into recyclable bottles. •Partnering with Plastic Bank, our initiative goes beyond preventing 2.5 million plastic bottles from polluting the ocean annually. It extends a helping hand to communities in third-world countries, providing opportunities for education and sustenance.
•
What is Ecoheads?? 
* Reduces water and energy usage by up to 65%
* Increases water pressure
* Filters and cleans water
* Introduces negative ions to soften the water
* Removes sediment, rust, and sand
